item.title: AUCTF 2020 Writeup - Pick Up That CAN
item.description: Intro This is the only challenge I solved in the Signals section. It’s been solved 59 times and it was worth 965 points. Description: Here’s a log of some kind of network traffic. The BASH script will help you set up your tools, and probably give you a hint as to what kind of network this is. You can download the log here. $ sha256sum pickupthatcan.log 6cd893bf99bf233d452aaa56ed65fcca51fef4e97493efa3ba6a44a0af03e95a pickupthatcan.log The shell script is really short.
